system.requirements:
Tier 2; Ballistic Skill 40, Weapon Skill 40
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill, Finesse
system.effect: When taking this talent Character selects either Ranged or Melee to represent "X" (affects requirements appropriately). When making a Called Shot, character does not suffer the usual -20 penalty. If X is Melee, this applies to melee attacks, if X is ranged, it applies to ranged attacks.
